item.title: A sense of taste, the ability to discern and bring forth that which is beautiful, is the effect of a great liberal arts education and also the skill needed to lead. Leaders are taste makers.
item.dc:creator: @ZoharAtkins
item.description: A sense of taste, the ability to discern and bring forth that which is beautiful, is the effect of a great liberal arts education and also the skill needed to lead. Leaders are taste makers.

item.title: The goal is to expand the Pareto frontier and expand on both the depth and breadth axes. Focus on one thing, then weave. Hedgehog, fox, hedgehog, fox, fox, fox, hedgehog.
item.dc:creator: @ZoharAtkins
item.description:

item.title: R to @ZoharAtkins: You also can't pay someone to eat your vegetables for you, work out for you, or be empathetic and patient for you.

item.title: You can pay somebody to Doordash for you, pray for you, hire and fire for you, but you can't pay someone to learn for you.
item.dc:creator: @ZoharAtkins
item.description: You can pay somebody to Doordash for you, pray for you, hire and fire for you, but you can't pay someone to learn for you.

item.title:
In the ancient world, literacy was scarce, so wordcels dominated.
Today, literacy is abundant, so imagecels dominate.
item.dc:creator: @ZoharAtkins
item.description:
In the ancient world, literacy was scarce, so wordcels dominated.

Today, literacy is abundant, so imagecels dominate.

item.title: R to @ZoharAtkins: The revised prompt should be what books are considered great in your field but are actually mid? It’s sort of the inverse of the hidden gem. The overpolished rock.
item.dc:creator: @ZoharAtkins
item.description: The revised prompt should be what books are considered great in your field but are actually mid? It’s sort of the inverse of the hidden gem. The overpolished rock.

item.title: All great books err, but err greatly. The important distinction is not between right and wrong, helpful and harmful, but great and mid.
item.dc:creator: @ZoharAtkins
item.description:

The important distinction is not between right and wrong, helpful and harmful, but great and mid.

item.title:

understanding harmful ideas is important! ppl should definitely read the anti-reading list

item.title: “AI will boost economic growth rates by half a percentage point a year. That is very much a guess. It does mean that, with compounding, the world is very different a few decades out. It also means that year to year non-infovores will not necessarily notice huge changes in their environments.”
item.dc:creator: @ZoharAtkins
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @ZoharAtkins: This is a fabulous read by @ZoharAtkins on those who retreat from confronting moral ambiguity and psychology of evil-doers. So relevant to campuses, institutional rot, and rampant pernicious or lurking evil.
Small correction: @GadSaad coined "Suicidal Empathy". Not Rabbi YY Jacobson.
item.dc:creator: @mikeeisenberg
item.description:
This is a fabulous read by @ZoharAtkins on those who retreat from confronting moral ambiguity and psychology of evil-doers. So relevant to campuses, institutional rot, and rampant pernicious or lurking evil.

Small correction: @GadSaad coined "Suicidal Empathy". Not Rabbi YY Jacobson.

nitter.privacydev.net/ZoharAtkins/status/1892980432339345870#m
